spatial.location: Lower level corridor near escalator entrance

description.short: Glass storefront retail store selling Coca-Cola merchandise and branded items
description.long: A specialty retail location featuring Coca-Cola Enterprises, Inc. branding. Red and white color scheme throughout. The store displays Coca-Cola merchandise, branded apparel, collectibles, and promotional items. Glass storefront with prominent corporate signage.

crd_evidence.discovery_note: Clearly visible in photos - not present in v3/v4/v6 maps
crd_evidence.integration_reason: v5 CRD identified missing retail entity

operational_status_by_era.1981: Not yet open (store type didn't exist at mall opening)
operational_status_by_era.1995: Operational (peak era - specialty corporate stores common)

temporal.timeline_note: Specialty corporate stores like this emerged in 1990s mall culture

meta.notes: NEW entity discovered through v5 CRD photo classification. Adds retail diversity to Z3. Corporate branded specialty store type typical of 1990s malls.
